CustomField.formula: Name +' | '+ InsatuyouSyohinEng__c +' | '+'Invoice to: '+ Seikyusaki__r.Name +' | '+ TEXT(Tariff__r.SellKingakuJPY__c) +' '+ $Setup.Site_Custom_Settings__c.Local_Currency__c+' | '+'Payment to: '+ PaymentTo__r.Name+ ' | '+ TEXT(Tariff__r.BuyKingaku__c) +' '+ $Setup.Site_Custom_Settings__c.Local_Currency__c+' | '+ TEXT(Suryo__c) +' | '+ ChargeUnitInPrint__c
CustomField.label: Summary of Billings
